EmailTemplate.description: FV2:The following email templates will be used to send email notifications to PDK bundle owner for Approval of Document Provisioning
EmailTemplate.name: Email Notification for Bundle Owner Approval
EmailTemplate.subject: Document Provisioning-Your approval is required for {!Document_Provisioning__c.Document_Title__c}{!Document_Provisioning__c.Sub_PDK__c} to {!Document_Provisioning__c.AccountID__r.Name}
